casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joseph Thomas OLDHAM. No. 71P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of March 2008 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
